text: 1.20: Ro 5.5; 8.19; Ef 6.19-20; 1 Pi 4.16Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nan vuzvuga guar, gu vhɨra khueŋ khothɨgi, gu bigɨna mbatɨk thueŋ muuŋgip nen memɨra ndirga. Gu kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, ntigem gum zumgum vhɨra, gu guigira thɨgɨ havhargip, gu mba zazera mbui tɨvir muuŋv, tɨvir vhuuiŋra muunga. Gu maaŋ muuŋgip ŋam kɨrga o, gu rimgirga, gu zazera zɨ bakɨmen Kraisra nɨɨnga.
